resources.string: This is a simple demonstration of the OPI relax science kit. It mimics an ElectroCardiography display showing the waveform and calculates the heart rate based on detected peaks.
This is not a medical device and should not be used as such. It is solely for demonstration purposes. Contact OP Innovations for more information.
Please insert Controller and Sensor to start Configuration.(This is not a medical device and should not be used as such.)
